long_description: The Cannondale Trail 4 men's hardtail mountain bike delivers a light, stiff and smooth ride for singletrack fun thanks to a cushy shock-absorbent fork and reliable Shimano components. SR Suntour XCR-XCL-RL suspension fork delivers 100mm of travel with lockout adjustment. Adjust your gearing on the go with the dependable Shimano drivetrain, which uses Acera trigger shifters and Alivio and Altus derailleurs to snap through the 27 gears. Light 6061 aluminum frame has double-butted tubes along with shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. Cannondale Helix 6 hydraulic disc brakes offer superb speed management for tiny finesses or big, outright stops. Sturdy Maddux rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Rapid Rob tires for versatile trail traction. Specs on the Cannondale Trail 4 men's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
